battleground.name: Age of Dragons
battleground.desc: All Dragons are bestowed with extraordinary vitality, regenerating each turn by 25% of their base health.

battleground.name: World Awakening
battleground.desc: All Elementals are Empowered from the mana rich land, raising their Attack by 2 each turn.

battleground.name: Rise of the Frogs
battleground.desc: All Frogs gain the Protection of the Guardian Stone, reducing damage taken by 2.

battleground.name: Iceshatter Barrier
battleground.desc: When Barrier is broken, deals damage to the creature across from it or the enemy Hero equal to the Barrier value.

battleground.name: Relentless Hunger
battleground.desc: The Undead are invigorated with an unquenchable hunger, giving them Berserk equal to 15% of their base Health.

battleground.name: Angelic Legion
battleground.desc: Angels have risen to fight, gaining Legion equal to 50% of their base Attack.

battleground.name: Elemental Surge
battleground.desc: Seismic shifts have given Elementals incredible power! Elementals have their Attack increased by 75% of their base, rounded up!

battleground.name: Poisonbolt Evolution
battleground.desc: Frogs have evolved to have Poisonbolt! They deal bolt damage and leave poison with their tongue, equal to 50% of their base attack!

battleground.name: Airborne Mastery
battleground.desc: The first time Avians activate, they permanently double their base Attack if the opposing card has more Attack.

battleground.name: Hardened Carapace
battleground.desc: Insects gain a hardened carapace, gaining Armored value equal to 10% of their base Health, rounded up.

battleground.name: Searing Essence
battleground.desc: When an Elemental is damaged by an attack, it deals Scorch damage to the attacker equal to 10% of the Elemental's base Health.

battleground.name: Goblin Barrage
battleground.desc: Each active Goblin throws a number of bombs equal to their base Attack at the start of each turn before other skills. Each bomb deals 1 damage and does not benefit from Hex or Venom.

battleground.name: Underwater Shelter
battleground.desc: All Seafolk dive beneath the waves, gaining a Barrier each turn equal to 30% of their base Health while on delay.

battleground.name: Eyes in the Sky
battleground.desc: Each Avian marks a random target upon first activation, Hexing them for 15% of their base Health. The Avian chooses a new mark when their current mark dies. Ignores Invisibility.

battleground.name: Undead Unearthed
battleground.desc: When an Undead dies it creates an Unearthed Skeleton token creature with 50% Attack and Health of the Undead that died. The token has Invisibility and Berserk values based on its rarity.

battleground.name: Elemental Surge
battleground.desc: Seismic shifts have given Elementals incredible power! Elementals have their Attack increased by 75% of their base, rounded up!

battleground.name: Venom
battleground.desc: Insects gain Venom equal to 10% of their Health. Creatures damaged by Insects are inflicted with Venom, taking damage at the end of their turn and taking additional damage from attacks and skills.

battleground.name: Energy Shield
battleground.desc: All Mechas have upgraded their protective protocols, gaining a Barrier equal to their base Attack each time they deal Attack damage.

battleground.name: Elemental Conflux
battleground.desc: Elementals gain abilities based on faction! Aether have their Attack increased by 50% of the base, Chaos gain Vengeance equal to 50% of base Attack, and Wyld gain an additional 25% base Health.

battleground.name: Dragonfire
battleground.desc: Dragons gain Scorch equal to 20% of their base Health.

battleground.name: Angelic Assault
battleground.desc: Angels have transcended, gaining Legion equal to 15% of their base Health.

battleground.name: Energy Warding
battleground.desc: All Mechas have upgraded their protective protocols, gaining Ward equal to 3 plus 10% of their base Health.

battleground.name: Aether Triumph
battleground.desc: Aether have their Attack and Health increased by 25% of the base.

battleground.name: Chaos Triumph
battleground.desc: Chaos have their Attack and Health increased by 25% of the base.

battleground.name: Wyld Triumph
battleground.desc: Wyld have their Attack and Health increased by 25% of the base.

battleground.name: Brine Edge
battleground.desc: Seafolk harness the power of the ocean, increasing their Attack by 15% of their base Health!

battleground.name: Insectile Venom
battleground.desc: Insects gain Venom equal to 1 plus 15% of their base Health. Creatures affected by Venom take damage at the end of the turn, and take additional damage from attacks and skills.

battleground.name: Poisonhide
battleground.desc: When a Frog is damaged by an attack, it deals Poison damage to the attacker equal to 5 plus 10% of the Frog's base Health.

battleground.name: Insect Swarm
battleground.desc: After dealing Attack damage, permanently increases Attack of the lowest Attack active non-tower ally creature by 20% of the Attacker's base Health.

battleground.name: Undead Vampirism
battleground.desc: Deals damage to opposing creatures and then heals self, even while on delay. Damage and heal are equal to 3 + 5% of the card's base Health. This damage cannot be increased.

battleground.name: Lily & Spear Formation
battleground.desc: Frogs deal extra damage on their first attack each turn equal to 25% of their base Health and gain Pierce equal to their base Attack.

battleground.name: Day of Dragons
battleground.desc: Dragons of 0-2 Delay gain Scorch equal to 20% of their base Health. Dragons of 3-4 Delay gain Regenerate equal to 10% of their base Health plus 4.

battleground.name: Elemental Discordance
battleground.desc: Aether gains Barrier 4+15%, Chaos gains Scorch 20% and Wyld deal extra damage on their first attack each turn equal to 30%. Void gets a fixed 4 of Venom, 9 Siphon. All % are based on base health.

battleground.name: Regenerating Carapace
battleground.desc: Insects gain Armor equal to 10% of their base Health, and Regenerate equal to 10% of their base Health.

battleground.name: All For One
battleground.desc: A bunch of BGEs are active.

battleground.name: Skydiving Assault
battleground.desc: Avian of 0-2 delay deal extra damage on their first attack each turn equal to 40% of their base Attack. Avians of 3-4 delay gain Shroud equal to 10% +2 of their base Health.

battleground.name: Steel's Edge
battleground.desc: All Mechas have modified their weaponry, increasing their Attack by 15% of their base Health!

battleground.name: Fear Aura
battleground.desc: Dragons of 0-2 delay gain Hex equal to 20% of their base Health. Dragons of 3-4 delay gain Weaken equal to 30% of their base Health, and gain Vengeance 8.

battleground.name: Elemental Crux
battleground.desc: Elementals gain skills based on faction! Aether gain Regenerate, Chaos gain Emberhide, and Wyld gain Corrosive. Skill values are 5 + the card's delay cost.

battleground.name: Adaptive Weaponry
battleground.desc: Mechas gain base Ward 3 and other abilities based on faction! Aether also gain Legion 3, Chaos gain Barrage 4, and Wyld gain Venom 3. They add their delay cost to all these values.

battleground.name: Dawn of Dragons
battleground.desc: Dragons gain skills based on their Delay (D)! 0D gain Scorch 4, 1D gain Scorch 5, 2D gain Scorch 6, 3D gain Regenerate 8, and 4D gain Regenerate 9.

battleground.name: Beetleton Mutations
battleground.desc: Insects gain skills based on their Delay (D)! 0D gain Berserk 3, 1D Berserk 4, 2D Berserk 5, 3D Armor 5, 4D Armor 6.

battleground.name: Conflicted Ocean
battleground.desc: All Seafolk gain barrier equal to 20% of their base health. Delay 0-2 Seafolk also deal bonus damage in their first attack equal to 10% of their base health and pierce equal to their base attack.

battleground.name: Blinding Radiance
battleground.desc: All Angels gain Invisibility 2. D 0-2 Angels gain Legion Equal to 15% of their base health, while D3 and 4 gain Emberhide 4 and 6 respectively.

battleground.name: Radioactive Biosteel
battleground.desc: Mechas gain base Regenerate and Ward equal to 15% of their base health and other abilities based on Delay! D0-2 gains Venom 3+Delay, while D3 and 4 get Poisonhide 7 and 9. Viracocha gains both bonuses.

battleground.name: Lily & Vampiric Spear Formation
battleground.desc: Frogs deal extra damage on their first attack each turn equal to 25% of their base Health, while also gaining Pierce and Siphon equal to their base Attack.

battleground.name: Goblin Battle Kit
battleground.desc: Active goblins throw bombs equal to their base Attack at the start of each turn. Each bomb deals 1 damage and does not benefit from Hex or Venom. They also regenerate 15% of their base health.

battleground.name: Unbreakable Waves
battleground.desc: Seafolk gain base Ward and other skills based on Delay! D0-2 gain Frostbreath and D3-4 Armored. Values gained on each skill are based on base health! Ward and Armor 10%, while Frostbreath is 15%.

battleground.name: Zenith of Dragons
battleground.desc: Dragons of 0-2 Delay gain Scorch equal to 25% of their base Health. Dragons of 3-4 Delay gain Regenerate equal to 15% of their base Health plus 4.

battleground.name: Exalted Warfare
battleground.desc: Angels are ready for war, gaining Legion 10% and Unrestricted Fervor 10%. Values gained on each skill are based on base health!

battleground.name: Evil Eye
battleground.desc: All avians mark a random target upon activation, ignoring invisibility and hexing them for 15%. 0-2D will Weaken random targets equal to 15%. 3-4D gain Shroud equal to 10%. Values are base HP based

battleground.name: Void Alignment
battleground.desc: The Void is here once again. Void cards gain Regen and Nullify equal to 20% of their base health

battleground.name: Unstoppable Swarm
battleground.desc: Insects gain Invisibility 3 and Swarm: After damaging, permanently increase attack of the weakest active ally creature by 20% of Attacker's base HP. Delay 3-4 get Poisonhide equal to 20% of base HP.

battleground.name: Counterblast Swarm
battleground.desc: Insects gain Backlash 2 and Swarm: After damaging, permanently increase attack of the weakest active ally creature by 15% of Attacker's base HP. Delay 3-4 get Poisonhide equal to 20% of base HP.

battleground.name: Reinforced Undead Vampirism
battleground.desc: All undeads receive Vampirism to 5% + 3. 0-2 delay also gain armor equal to 10%. All values based on Health

battleground.name: Elemental Disruption
battleground.desc: Aether gains Barrier 4+15%, Chaos gains Scorch 20%, Wyld deal extra damage on their first attack each turn equal to 30% and Void gets 20% regeneration. All % are based on base health.

battleground.name: Radioactive Steel
battleground.desc: Mechas gain Ward equal to 15% of their base health and other abilities based on Delay! D0-2 gains Venom 3+Delay, while D3 and 4 get Poisonhide 7 and 9. Viracocha gains both bonuses.

battleground.name: Revitalizing Waves
battleground.desc: Seafolk gain Regenerate and other skills based on Delay! D0-2 gain Frostbreath and D3-4 Armor. Values gained on each skill are equal to 10% of base health!

battleground.name: Enhanced Battle Kit
battleground.desc: All goblins gain barrage equal to their base attack, 0-2 Delay goblins gain 15% siphon and 3-4 delay goblins gain 15% ward. Values gained on each skill are based on base health.

battleground.name: Celestial Voidness
battleground.desc: Angels gain barrier 2+15%, 0-2 delay angels gain 10% legion and 3-4 delay angels gain 10% weaken. 0-2 delay voids gain 3+10% Siphon and 3-4 delay voids gain 3+10% Regenerate. Values based on HP!

battleground.name: Celestial Raid
battleground.desc: All Angels gain barrier 2+15%, 0-2 Delay angel 10% legion and 3-4 delay angel 10% weaken. Values gained on each skill are based on base health!.

battleground.name: Deadly Sting
battleground.desc: 0-2 Delay Insects gain 2+10% venom and 3+20% Pierce and 3-4 delay Insect gain 2+10% corrosive and 2+7% vengeance. Values gained on each skill are based on base health!.

battleground.name: Flaming Scales
battleground.desc: All Dragons gain invisibility equal to 3, 0-2 Delay Dragons gain 2 plus 10% scorch and 3-4 delay Dragons gain 15% Emberhide. Values gained on each skill are based on base health.

battleground.name: Lily & Vampiric Spear Formation Reinforced
battleground.desc: Frogs deal extra damage on their first attack each turn equal to 25% of their base Health, while also gaining Pierce equal to their base Attack and Siphon as 3 plus their Attack.

battleground.name: Sky Destruction
battleground.desc: All Avians gain 2+delay Vengeance. Avian of 0-2 delay deal extra damage on their first attack each turn equal to 40% of their base Attack. Avians of 3-4 delay gain Shroud equal to 10% +2 of their base Health.

battleground.name: Steel's Edge V2.0
battleground.desc: All Mechas gain base Ward 3 + Delay, and increase their Attack by 15% of their base Health.

battleground.name: Thriving Swarm
battleground.desc: All Insects gain extra Health equal to 10% of their base Health and Swarm equal to 15% of their base health. After dealing Attack damage, Swarm permanently increases the Attack of the weakest ally.

battleground.name: Goblin Civil War
battleground.desc: All Goblins gain 10% Armor. Aether gain 7% + Delay Frostbreath, Chaos gain 20% + Delay Barrage, Wyld gain 10% + delay Venom, Void gain Siphon equal to base Attack. Values are based on base health.

battleground.name: Elemental Meltdown
battleground.desc: All Elementals are Enraged for 7% health. 0-2D Elementals gain Weaken and Pierce equal to 15% base health. 3-4D Elementals gain Shroud and Vengeance for 10% base health.

battleground.name: Eye of the Maelstrom
battleground.desc: All Seafolk gain Mark equal to 15% base health. 3-4D Seafolk also gain Regenerate for 15% base health.

battleground.name: Angels and Demons
battleground.desc: All Angels gain Vampirism equal to 5% base Health + 2. When an Angel dies it creates a token creature with 75% Attack and Health of the Angel that died. The token has Invisibility and Legion based on its rarity.

battleground.name: Castle Siege
battleground.desc: All enemies start with a Castle Tower card.

battleground.name: Cannon Siege
battleground.desc: All enemies start with a Cannon Tower card.

battleground.name: Frostbite's Aura
battleground.desc: Frostbite Heals and Empowers all of his allies, increasing in strength as he levels up.

battleground.name: Nethergore's Reckoning
battleground.desc: Nethergore Heals and Empowers all of his allies, increasing in strength as he levels up.

battleground.name: Fortune's Favoring
battleground.desc: Fortune's Favor Heals and Empowers all of its allies, increasing in strength as it levels up.

battleground.name: Tree of Life
battleground.desc: All enemies start with a Tree of Life card.

battleground.name: Flash Storms
battleground.desc: When an Elemental card is played, a Storm card is shuffled into the opponent's deck. When a Storm card is drawn, all their creatures are weakened for that turn!

battleground.name: The Thunderdome
battleground.desc: Bolt and Bolt All skills deal 50% more damage.

battleground.name: Fortified Tower
battleground.desc: All enemies start with a Fortified Tower card. The tower evolves with the strongest opponents!

battleground.name: Dungeon's Despair
battleground.desc: Dungeon's Despair Heals and Empowers all the enemy creatures, increasing in strength as the dungeon level increases.

battleground.name: Runic Sanctuary
battleground.desc: Barrier and Barrier All skills are 50% more effective.

battleground.name: Defender's Castle
battleground.desc: Players who go second start with a Castle Tower card.

battleground.name: Firestarter
battleground.desc: Scorch skills deal 50% more damage.

battleground.name: The Arena
battleground.desc: In Arena Battles, the player who goes first has one additional Delay added to the first card they play in a battle.

battleground.name: Golden Leaf Shelter
battleground.desc: All Frogs gain Barrier each turn equal to 20% of their base Health.

battleground.name: Cursed Land
battleground.desc: Hex and Hex All skills are 50% more effective.

battleground.name: Enchanted Armor
battleground.desc: Armor skills are 50% more effective.

battleground.name: Goblin's Treachery
battleground.desc: Goblin Heals and Empowers all of his allies, increasing in strength as he levels up.

battleground.name: Corrosive Hide
battleground.desc: Corrosive skills are 50% more effective.

battleground.name: Frozen Winds
battleground.desc: Frostbreath skills deal 50% more damage.

battleground.name: The Arena
battleground.desc: In Arena Battles, the player who goes first has two additional Delay added to the first card they play in a battle.

battleground.name: Empowered Spirits
battleground.desc: Empower and Empower All skills are 50% more effective.

battleground.name: Vengeance War
battleground.desc: Vengeance skills are 50% more effective.

battleground.name: Berserker Rage
battleground.desc: Berserk skills are 50% more effective.

battleground.name: Vanishing Enchantment
battleground.desc: All cards gain Invisibility 99.

battleground.name: Dragons are the Worst
battleground.desc: Dragons gain Bolt all Knight 5.

battleground.name: Invincible Armor
battleground.desc: All cards gain Armor 99.

battleground.name: Forgeborn
battleground.desc: All cards gain Scorch equal to 10% of their base Health.

battleground.name: Null Enchantment
battleground.desc: All cards gain Nullify 99.

battleground.name: Corrosive Husk
battleground.desc: All cards gain Corrosive 99.

battleground.name: Master Warding Shield
battleground.desc: All cards gain Ward 99.

battleground.name: Furious Soul
battleground.desc: All cards get Enraged equal to 20% of their base Health.

battleground.name: Powderkeg
battleground.desc: All cards gain Barrage equal to their base Attack.

battleground.name: Runepocalypse
battleground.desc: All bonuses from Runes are doubled.

battleground.name: Celerity Crash
battleground.desc: All cards are 1 Delay.

battleground.name: Conflux
battleground.desc: All creatures gain abilities based on faction! Aether have their Attack increased by 50% of the base, Chaos gain Vengeance equal to 50% of base Attack, and Wyld gain an additional 25% base Health.

battleground.name: Molten Scales
battleground.desc: Emberhide skills deal 50% more damage.

battleground.name: Vulcanos' Favor
battleground.desc: Scorchbreath skill deal 50% more damage.

battleground.name: Legion's Call
battleground.desc: Legion skills are 50% more effective.

battleground.name: Crippling Blows
battleground.desc: Weaken and Weaken All skills are 50% more effective.

battleground.name: Tainted Strike
battleground.desc: Poison skills deal 50% more damage.

battleground.name: Sundering Blades
battleground.desc: Pierce skills are 50% more effective.

battleground.name: Mending Aura
battleground.desc: Heal and Heal All skills are 50% more effective.

battleground.name: Regrowth Burst
battleground.desc: Regenerate skills are 50% more effective.

battleground.name: Draining Soul
battleground.desc: Siphon skills are 50% more effective.

battleground.name: Common Revenge
battleground.desc: All Common cards have their Attack, Health, and all Skills multiplied by 6!

battleground.name: Common Fireworks
battleground.desc: All Common cards have their Health and all Skills multiplied by 5! In addition, they gain Barrage equal to 5 times their base Attack!

battleground.name: Gigantic Clash
battleground.desc: All cards have their base Attack and base Health doubled.

battleground.name: Unlife Clash
battleground.desc: When a card dies it creates an Unearthed Skeleton token creature with 50% Attack and Health of the unit that died. The token has Invisibility and Berserk values based on its rarity.

battleground.name: Sanctuary Clash
battleground.desc: All cards gain Shroud 99.

battleground.name: Revenge Clash
battleground.desc: Vengeance, Emberhide and Backlash skills are 50% more effective.

battleground.name: Crushing Wave Clash
battleground.desc: Frogs and Seafolk deal extra damage on their first attack each turn equal to 25% of their base Health.

battleground.name: Doubling Clash
battleground.desc: All cards gain Dualstrike every 1.

battleground.name: Firepower Clash
battleground.desc: Bolt, Frostbreath and Hex skills are doubled. Health is also doubled.

battleground.name: Decay Clash
battleground.desc: Scorch, Poison, Emberhide and Scorchbreath skills are doubled. Health is also doubled.

battleground.name: Detonation Clash
battleground.desc: When a card dies, it throws a number of bombs equal to 50% of its base Health. Each bomb deals 1 damage and does not benefit from Hex or Poison.

battleground.name: Epic Madness
battleground.desc: All Epic cards have their Attack, Health, and all Skills multiplied by 2! Freeze and Dualstrike are not affected.

battleground.name: Enhanced Armor
battleground.desc: Armor is increased by 25

battleground.name: Touch of Death
battleground.desc: All cards gain Poison 99

battleground.name: Improved Sigils
battleground.desc: All cards gain Ward 25.

battleground.name: Stunning Attacks
battleground.desc: All cards gain Daze 15

battleground.name: Stubborn Ferocity
battleground.desc: All cards gain Valor 15

battleground.name: Endless Life
battleground.desc: All cards gain Regenerate 99

battleground.name: Endless Rage
battleground.desc: All cards gain Berserk 10

battleground.name: Warding Tower
battleground.desc: All enemies start with a Warding Tower card. The tower evolves with the strongest opponents!

battleground.name: Primal Mending
battleground.desc: Your creatures get healed for 2 every turn in battle.

battleground.name: Personal Frog Buff
battleground.desc: All ally Frogs gain the Protection of the Watcher, reducing damage taken by 2.

battleground.name: Scylla's Presence
battleground.desc: Scylla empowers her minions, increasing their stats with each Mastery level!

battleground.name: Riptide Nightsong
battleground.desc: Enemies become stronger with each passing Mastery level.

battleground.desc: Dyrnwyn's Spirit fights harder with each passing Mastery level, increasing cards' stats!

battleground.name: Lightning Fast
battleground.desc: The Lightning Boss has one Delay removed from the first card they play in this Lightning Boss Node.

battleground.name: Epics Only
battleground.desc: All non-Epic cards have their attributes greatly reduced.

battleground.name: The Arena
battleground.desc: In Arena Battles, the player who goes first has two additional Delay added to the first card they play in a battle.

battleground.name: The Arena
battleground.desc: In Arena Battles, the player who goes first has one additional Delay added to the first two cards they play in a battle.

battleground.name: The Arena
battleground.desc: In Arena Battles, the player who goes first has one Delay added to the first card they play and the player who goes second has one Delay removed from the first card they play.
